1370: Richolfus moved to St. Ians straet.B.6 after marriage.
Got married to Emmelina at age 32 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Emmelina, Emmelina, at age 32.
1372: Had a son with Emmelina, Thomas, at age 34.
1375: Had a daughter with Emmelina, Goneir, at age 37.
1376: Had a son with Emmelina, Iordanus, at age 38.
1377: Lost son Goeskin when Goeskin was 0 years old.
Emmelina gave birth to their stillborn son Goeskin in 1377.
1378: Had a daughter with Emmelina, Suaneka, at age 40.
1383: Had a daughter with Emmelina, Ermegardis, at age 45.
